Chapter 475:
Chapter 155: Roll Up

The turmoil of establishing a new church ended, and Caesar IV completed the enthronement of nobles as quickly as possible. Then he sent all the lords back home on the grounds that the construction of the Near East was "time-sensitive and the task was heavy."

In Hudson's view, this was purely a sign of guilty conscience.

I got a big piece of cake from the Mossi people without the knowledge of the nobles in my country. It would be difficult to deal with it if I was discovered.

The best option is to send all the lords back to their fiefdoms first, so that by the time everyone receives the news, the facts have already been established.

The newly added territory is the queen's dowry. Although the area is a bit too large, giving fiefdoms as gifts when marrying daughters is a precedent in the continent of Aslant.

The question is: The royal family of Moshi is so noble!

On the surface, this is just a dowry and there is no insider trading.

Under the monarch-subject relationship system, even if it is a joint-stock system, the king still has more say in politics than the local lords.

As long as the king plays by the rules and is not caught, even if everyone has doubts in their hearts, they will have to accept it.

Without any delay, Hudson resigned from his military post, handed over command to the Military Affairs Department as quickly as possible, and then returned directly to the territory.

The established strategic goals have been achieved, so there is really no need to stay in the capital and be hated by others.

The proposal of the Near East Protectorate was not passed, but because the Near East provinces lacked core leadership, military and political affairs still had to be managed by him as the front-line governor.

This trusteeship was not operated by Hudson, but was proposed by a group of small and medium-sized nobles below.

It is certainly uncomfortable to be controlled by someone, but if there is no one to restrain you, no one will care when the orcs come.

By the time the report reached the royal capital and went through a round of procedures, there was not even enough time to collect their bodies.

Caesar IV was hesitant, but the kingdom's top leaders expressed their support, and the king could not go against them.

After all, someone needs to be in charge of the front-line defense, and the six provincial governors are vacant. We can't let the kingdom appoint paratroopers, right?

If that were to be done, the governor would have to be equipped with a guard. Given the current situation in the Near East, a standing army was the most basic requirement.

Six airborne governors will need to dispatch six additional legions and arrange for a large group of experts to escort them.

The local nobles have no objection, but the kingdom's finances can't bear it!

According to the previous plan, the permanent troops in the Near East are 200,000. If another 60,000 troops are added, the kingdom will have to expand the standing army.

After all, troops need to be left behind in the country. Even if the threat on the western and southern fronts is not great for the time being, one or two legions should be stationed there symbolically.

...

After ending his miserable military life and returning to the territory, Hudson felt refreshed.

After coming back from a trip out, my son was able to take small steps and stroll around the lord's mansion.

Perhaps because of the blood connection, after being picked up by Hudson, the little guy was not shy at all and his eyes kept moving around curiously.

"Hudson, can you give up the title of Duke Xueyue?

The Near East is too dangerous. So many nobles in the kingdom are avoiding it. You still..."

Melissa's tears fell before she finished her complaints.

Having a child inevitably changes your perspective on things.

In Melissa's opinion, the Mountain Territory's foundation was already large enough, and there was no need to continue going out on adventures.

Unlike before, the Mountain Territory has changed a lot now. A large number of immigrants have poured in, making this land prosperous all of a sudden.

He owns tens of millions of acres of fertile land and governs more than 1.5 million people. Looking at the entire continent, he is a powerful lord.

Even though his family's strength was lagging behind, Hudson was still one of the most prominent nobles in the entire kingdom.

"Someone must have whispered something in your ear!"

"Melissa, you should know that people in the aristocratic circle have no control over their own behavior.

No one expected that the countries in Central Continent were so useless that they would lose so easily and hand over large tracts of land to foreign races.

The continental war is over, but the strategic situation the kingdom is now facing has become increasingly passive.

Developing the Near East became the kingdom's only option for a strategic breakthrough. This was not just an expansion, but also the key to gathering confidence throughout the kingdom.

Just like the Mossi people withstood pressure from all sides and forcibly annexed the Warhammer Kingdom, we have no choice.

Especially at such moments, we must take the initiative to let our people see the hope of defeating foreign races.

If the Near East strategy fails, the entire Northern Continent will be at risk of falling, and the Mountain Territory will not be able to remain unscathed.

After all, you have to take this step and take your destiny into your own hands, which is always better than letting others passively accept it.

Besides, things are not that bad. No matter how bad the situation gets, it will only lead to casualties. Can the orcs keep me here?"

Hudson said confidently.

The most important factor for daring to wade into the muddy waters of the Near East is the guarantee of personal safety.

Anyway, developing the Near East does not mean giving up the mountainous territory, so he will not bring the family scroll or anything like that.

Not only did he himself not carry a family scroll, he also did not recommend that nobles who had been granted titles in the Near East carry a family scroll.

At least before the Near East defense line is completed, there is no need to bring these burdens over.

Without the constraints of his family, Hudson could act freely. When pressed to the limit, he would abandon the city and run to the prairie to play the game of exchanging homes with the orcs.

There is no need to target all the Orc tribes, just catch the Orc Royal Tribe and give them a good beating.

With the Behemoths as a precedent, Hudson didn't believe that the Orc royal family would not be afraid.

A royal family was crippled, and another round of chaos ensued.

Although the Orc Prairie has not yet reached the point where rivers of blood are flowing, the battle for the royal throne has already begun.

The situation has developed to this point, and the five royal families are no longer able to unite. The Behemoths, whose strength has been drastically reduced and whose population has been severely damaged, are now having difficulty even controlling their vassal races.

Many small and medium-sized Behemoth tribes disappeared quietly on the prairie due to various accidents.

If the Behemoth King Alex had not reacted quickly enough and announced his resignation from the royal position in time, this kind of "accident" would have become the norm.

The other four tribes also wanted to help Rabimon, but their own situation was not very good. The continuous failures on the battlefield eventually affected the foundation of their rule.

When the royal family does not have the power to overwhelm other clans, they are no longer the royal family. At this moment, the other four royal clans jumped out to fight for the position of the royal family, which was also deliberately done by the other four royal clans.

Once the military advantage no longer exists, a conflict that has been suppressed by force will explode.

If we don't take the opportunity to lead the various tribes to fight each other and consume their strength, perhaps the final target will be directed at the entire orc royal family.

There is no doubt that the Alpha Kingdom, as a good neighbor, also helped them secretly.

The smuggling caravans on the border have become active and are providing various assistance to all parties involved in the internal fighting.

If the racial differences were not so great that it would be inconvenient for people to directly infiltrate the Orc Empire, and they could only rely on bribing spies to operate, I am afraid that the internal strife would have turned into a civil war long ago.

Everyone can see the problem, but everyone is using an open conspiracy. The throne of the royal family is vacant, who can not be jealous?

If the four royal families intervene with all their strength, it is indeed possible to quell the conflict, but it is also possible that they will push themselves into an endless abyss.

If they don't instigate racial infighting among the people and vent their resentment, they might just unite and rebel against them.

For their own safety, the best option is to add fuel to the fire, watch the major races fight among themselves, decide on a new royal family, and then everyone will continue to play the previous game of co-governance of the five royal families.

"I know you are powerful, but there is no mercy on the battlefield. If something unexpected happens, what will you do to us orphans and widows?"

Melissa said angrily.

Seriously, if it weren't for Hudson, the Koslow family would have been divided up in a matter of decades.

The reputation he left behind could only last for a dozen years at most. When the troops who had followed him in his battles grew old, they would no longer be polite.

"Don't worry, that day won't come. Besides, I have prepared a backup plan. Even if we really encounter the worst situation, you will be fine!"

Hudson said calmly.

As if he had sensed something, Bear Stearns suddenly jumped out from behind, picked up the bear paw and watched the show from the side.

Then the miniature version of Maxim appeared in Hudson's sight, waving his claws at him, as if to say:

"Don't worry, I will take care of your wife and children. Just leave the treasure behind."

The funny scene made Hudson's face turn pale in an instant.

The slap in the face came too quickly. Although Pizilong is loyal, the proportion of his betrayal is too high.

The situation of the Unscrupulous Bear is better, but people are also waiting for him to make a fool of himself. Looking at the photo stones scattered around, it is clear that Bear Stearns is collecting black material on Master Hudson again.

The funny scene appeared, and Melissa's nervous expression suddenly relaxed a lot.

With two powerful sanctuaries guarding him, Hudson will basically not die as long as he doesn't do anything stupid.

The elves, who openly have the largest number of holy domain warriors, only have four holy domains and a unicorn holy beast. They can't all come together to ambush him!

Besides, even if it was an ambush, it might not succeed. Just because you can't fight, doesn't mean you can't run away.

Hudson knew very well the temperament of his own mount.

There is no such thing as a fight to the death. If they really sense danger, they will take him away immediately without his orders.

After the episode, Hudson's sense of crisis came to a head. If there was no danger under normal circumstances, there would be abnormal circumstances.

As his status and position continue to improve, more and more people want to kill him. Hudson can't guarantee that he can get away with it every time.

"Strength" is still not enough. If his own strength is also at the holy realm, I guess no one would have such an idea.

Unfortunately, Hudson's training time was too short. Even with the help of the mysterious compass, both his knight and magic remained at the sixth level. (Golden Knight/Great Mage)

It was difficult for his strength to have a qualitative breakthrough in the short term. Even if he entered the seventh or eighth level, it would not affect anything. He could only hope that the dragon and the bear could be more powerful and break through the second level of the Holy Domain as soon as possible.

Then Hudson dismissed this unreliable idea. His own practice was very successful, and Bear Stearns and Maxim were even more successful.

The journey that would have taken hundreds of years to complete was completed in just a few years. The blessing from the bloodline was exhausted, and the rest depended on one's own understanding.

If it were easy, we wouldn't add the word "king" at the end. Whether it's the dragon king or the bear king, they are both rare animals.

The dragon clan was better off, at least there was still a dragon king in the clan. Bear Stearns didn't even know whether the earth bear clan had a living bear king.

After a few days of rest at home, Hudson began to deal with the backlog of government affairs in the territory. He said he was dealing with them, but in fact he was just looking through them. Whether he should do it or not, it had already happened.

During the war, a large number of immigrants poured in and various emergencies emerged one after another. Hudson was commanding the army on the front line, so it was impossible for him to make a decision.

Problems definitely exist, but judging from the overall development of the territory, the management is still qualified, and his training over the years is worth it.

Of course, the smooth operation of the Mountain Territory is mainly due to the system established by Hudson.

Everything has been regulated, and as long as the management is not too lame, everything can be handled according to the previous regulations.

Even if you encounter an emergency, you can refer to the emergency plan and take temporary measures to deal with it.

Regardless of how it was handled well or badly, the problem was solved at least without causing any major consequences.

...

"I have read all the documents. In the past year, everyone has done a good job. Although there have been a series of problems, the overall performance is still satisfactory.

I have recorded all the achievements. Now our most important task is to formulate a plan for the development of the Near East.

By the way, when I was in the capital, I spent a lot of money to buy the royal territory in the southeastern province. Jacob, take your people over to take it over."

Hudson chattered without changing his expression.

Purchasing territory was naturally impossible. The Alpha royal family was at its peak, and it was not yet time to sell off their ancestral heritage.

If it was a rotten piece of land like that in the Near East, if the royal family spent a little more money, maybe they could sell a few knighthoods.

The fertile land of the Southeastern Province Royal Territory that can generate huge profits every year is a core asset for family heirlooms and is definitely not something that can be bought with money.

Anyone who believed it and foolishly went to buy land from Caesar IV would definitely experience for himself what the royal iron fist is.

It's better to talk nonsense than to have no reason at all. Why would the royal family give him such a huge fortune for no reason?

This kind of thing cannot withstand verification. It is better to give a ridiculous explanation as soon as possible than to implicate him when everyone finds out about the deal between the royal family and the Mossi.

If Hudson dared to participate, he would be ready to be exposed. Anyway, he was playing an irreplaceable role in the Near East strategy, and even if everyone knew about it, they would only curse him a few times.

Maybe deep down, they all admired him and Caesar IV for their ability to do things. Maybe in the next few years, when they teach their children, they will become "other people's children" together.

However, even if it is a leak, it still requires skill. Since Caesar IV took a bigger piece of the pie, he should attract more firepower.

We are all family, so even though we were full of doubts, we still forced ourselves to suppress our curiosity.

The most important thing when getting involved in politics is to control your curiosity and never know things that you shouldn't know.

"Yes, Duke!"

Jacob replied immediately.

Everybody eats from the same pot, and no matter how this royal territory fell into the hands of their master, it is a good thing for everyone present.

The stronger the territory is, the brighter the future will be for those of them who depend on Hudson.

Simply calculating the territory area, the Mountain Territory + Snow Moon Territory can catch up with a small principality.

The population is slightly less, but Hudson has already spent a lot of money to buy it. The current Hudson's Magical Beast Ripening Potion is a hard currency on the mainland, and it has a great reputation even among the alien races.

If Hudson had not been worried about causing unnecessary trouble and deliberately controlled the shipment volume, and further diluted the concentration so that the efficacy was similar to the best ripening agent on the market, he would have made even more money.

People are always more willing to believe what is within their own knowledge. As for the problem of decreased efficacy of medicines, the official explanation given by Hudson is that the precious medicinal materials have been used up and substitutes are now being used.

This explanation was recognized by more than 90% of the alchemy masters on the continent. They were all at the top of the pyramid, so how could they admit that they were not as good as the newcomers who had just emerged?

It must be a problem with the medicinal materials!

Even if it was for the annual R&D funding, they had to fool people as much as possible. As for the Hart's Magical Beast Ripening Potion, it had long been deciphered by everyone, but they just pretended to be ignorant while knowing the truth.

All magic potion masters know that the effectiveness of Ha's potion comes from easily absorbed ownerless energy, but no one knows how the energy is generated.

Purifying energy from magic crystals and then artificially infusing it into potions from the outside world is something that goes against the laws of magic.

Everyone was led astray to look for energy sources. It is said that some people even spent a lot of money to get dragon feces and bear urine for experiments...

Then the tragedy began. The effectiveness of the Ha's medicine was not seen, but the side effects were quite significant.

...

For the sake of the Near East strategy, the nobles of the Alpha Kingdom were forced to roll up again.

Even though only the second eldest son and the children of the collateral branches went there this time, the actual investment of the major nobles was still not small.

High risks are often accompanied by high returns. It is not possible to take risks by devoting all the strength of the whole family, but it is still possible to invest 10% or 20% of the strength to give it a try.

This confidence was largely due to Hudson's record. Master Hudson had never suffered a loss in fighting against the orcs, and as long as he started fighting, it was just a matter of how much he won.

Seeing that Hudson had gained a lot in the Near East, everyone thought he was full of confidence, and each of them had the idea of ​​just in case he succeeded.

With the help of their staff in analyzing the situation, a number of nobles with strong political acumen realized that the Near East strategy might lead to a major reshuffle of the major factions in the kingdom.

If they just stand firm, then everything will remain the same and there will be no impact on everyone. But if the Near East is developed, it will sound the clarion call for the kingdom's strategic counterattack.

If you succeed once, you will probably succeed a second time. Whoever seizes the first opportunity will take the initiative in the future political game of the kingdom.

Although they said that they were not interested in the position of governor, they were secretly rubbing their hands, waiting for an opportunity to seize power.

The sons of the great nobles took the lead in opening the exam papers, which confused the small and medium nobles. The asymmetry of information directly affected everyone's judgment.

According to everyone's past experience, if you don't know what exactly happened, just follow the great nobles.

Even if it is a mistake, it is a mistake made by everyone, which is almost the same as no one making a mistake.

Small and medium-sized nobles who do not have enough tolerance for error may be eliminated directly if they do not follow up in time and make a wrong judgment.

As an emerging nouveau riche with a large number of members, the Koslow family has been very busy recently.

This is only the first generation to become wealthy, and the relationships with previous relatives and friends have not yet been broken due to the difference in status.

Those who should visit should visit, and those who should move around should continue to move around. Because of Hudson's special status, it is often inconvenient for him to show up, but he still sent representatives to perform all the etiquette that should be observed in interpersonal communication.

When faced with an emergency like this, personal connections come into play. In recent days, there has been an endless stream of people coming to inquire about the news.

"Father, they are not just here to gather information, right?"

Hudson asked with a grin.

Without the title, Redman lived a more carefree life. The title is both an honor and an obligation.

Compared to his old friends who were running around for their families and children, Redman was completely free. With Hudson in the front, his brothers and sisters didn't need him, an old father, to worry about them.

Even the unfortunate boy Evola who ran to the northern border became one of the few lucky ones who escaped the orcs' attack because his fiefdom was too remote.

While other lords of the Northern Frontier were busy with post-war reconstruction, he was the only one who was leisurely drinking tea and basking in the sun in his territory.

Of course, the disadvantages were also very obvious. The territory was too isolated, the messenger got lost in the mountains and forests, and when the conscription order was passed to Baron Evola, the kingdom's army had already withdrawn.

Without fighting a single battle, there was no way to gain military merit. During the entire continental war, Baron Evola sat in fear in his territory.

No one cared what Baron Evola thought, but Redman was very satisfied. If they could survive the orc invasion safely, then this was a treasure land.

It doesn't matter if the territory is a little isolated. Anyway, the territory can be self-sufficient and has very low dependence on the outside world.

With the idea of ​​making use of his remaining energy, Redman's main job became chatting with old friends and showing off his "good parenting skills".

Hudson didn't know whether anyone was led to the gutter, but the Koslow family maintained a very good network of relationships among the middle and lower classes.

In the eyes of many petty nobles, Redman's chatting and reminiscing about the past was the treatment that only comes from treating them as "one of our own".

"In addition to gathering information, some people came to buy weapons on credit, and to borrow money and food.

Because the amount was not large, at most only a few thousand gold coins, and they were all favors, I just took the initiative and agreed to it."

Redman said proudly.

Obviously, he stole the limelight in front of his old friends again this time.

If it was before Hudson's rise, he would never dare to promise thousands of gold coins easily.

The situation is different now. Because of his special status, when people give gifts to Hudson, they will also give him one.

You can solve the problem with your own little treasury.
Chapter 476:
Chapter 156: Establishing a New Church

"Since we are old friends, Father should just give them some information in a subtle way!

The Kingdom's Near East strategy is a high-investment, high-risk, high-return business. It is up to them whether they are willing to participate or not."

Hudson responded calmly.

The family's network of contacts had played a role in the early stages of his entrepreneurship, so he naturally couldn't turn his back on them.

Hudson doesn't mind providing them with some help within his ability.

All the words I'm saying now are from the bottom of my heart. The small nobles' participation in the Near East strategy is simply a gamble with their family foundation.

However, it is precisely because of the high risk that there will be high returns. If there were no threat from the orcs, the Near East would have become a piece of fat meat. How could they have the qualifications to participate?

If small nobles and commoners want to go further, they must fight with their lives. This is the nature of the world.

If you don't fight now, when the era of big mergers comes, you won't have a chance even if you want to.

Those who have obtained fiefs in the Near East are now considered to have taken the lead. Those who have not obtained fiefs can only rely on other nobles and follow them to seek wealth and fame.

If nothing unexpected happens, the major families will continue to recruit people to reserve talents for the development of the Near East, including the Koslo family.

When it comes to recruiting people to join a group, you also need to be skillful. It is best to let people come to you on their own initiative rather than going to them to invite them.

Especially when it involves past personal relationships, if you appear too enthusiastic, it is easy for the other person to have the illusion that they are helping you just because of your friendship.

"Hudson, tell me the truth. What are the chances of success of the Kingdom's Near East strategy?"

Redman asked seriously.

People's desires will grow. In the past, he felt that if all his sons could get a piece of fiefdom and expand the family business, it would be the greatest success in life.

With the sudden rise of Hudson, this "dream" hidden deep in my heart was almost completed.

The three sons above all have fiefs, and the two younger sons below are likely to get some benefits as well. Except for the useless Lai Suer, his life is perfect.

However, the wealth that Hudson gained had its limits. One barony was almost the limit, and if one wanted to go further, one had to fight for it.

Apart from Hudson, the one who has developed the best so far is the eldest son. Because he has been trained since childhood, Nelson has a stronger ability to deal with people, and was recommended by Hudson to serve as an official in the capital.

The civil service route is slow to make money, but it is safer. With the support of the family, as long as you don't mess around, you don't have to worry about wealth.

The rest are not so good. The second oldest is too reckless to handle the important task, and the two younger ones have no feelings for Hudson, so it is impossible to invest too many resources in them.

If they didn't have the opportunity, they probably wouldn't be able to catch up with the second brother. At least the second brother's territory was a Feng Shui treasure land specially selected by Hudson, and they wouldn't have such treatment.

Just looking at this orc invasion, the lords in the Northern Frontier suffered heavy casualties, including five members of the Koslo family who were developing in the Northern Frontier.

"30%!"

Hudson stated a cold number without changing his expression, which directly dispelled Redman's fantasy.

The probability of "30%" is enough to make everyone determined to take a gamble, but the probability of the kingdom's success is 30%, which does not mean that the probability of the noble children's success is also 30%.

It is more likely that the children of the nobility continued to pour into the Near East, using their flesh and blood to exchange for the success of the kingdom's Near East strategy. In this process, the children of the nobility might have changed several times.

From the perspective of the kingdom, as long as it can succeed, it is worth paying some price.

But from a father's perspective, Redman didn't want to take the risk. The risk was too high, so high that he didn't even dare to suggest to Hudson that he take care of his brother.

With such a low probability, one can imagine how much pressure the coach is under. It is good enough to be able to keep Xueyueling, how dare he continue to be distracted.

"When you get to the Near East, you will find that there is nothing you cannot give up. Reputation and status are all false, and only your life is your own.

Even if you lose the Near East, you are still a great noble of the kingdom. No matter how much the situation deteriorates, it will not affect the mountainous territory for a while.

As long as this foundation is still there, everything can start over. If you are too rigid, you will break easily. There is no need to pursue victory every time! "

Redman's heartfelt words moved Hudson, but also made him feel helpless.

Sure enough, some truths cannot be told. If the outside world knew that in his eyes, the success rate of the Near East strategy was only 30%, everyone's enthusiasm would be extinguished immediately.

There is no way, the reality is so cruel. It is enough to fool others with an exaggerated success rate, but you must not fool yourself.

The orcs were not fools, so how could they watch the kingdom's Near East strategy succeed? The orcs' great fight on the prairie was essentially a risk release.

This kind of chaos is not the first time in the history of the Orc Empire. When all parties are tired of fighting, they will naturally go to the negotiation table.

With a few more years of buffer time, the four major royal families have recovered and can then bring in the newly emerging royal families to work together to formulate new rules of the game.

If the fighting is too fierce and all clans are seriously injured, it is entirely possible that the five royal families will become four royal families.

Once the situation in the Orc Empire stabilizes, war will surely break out in the Near East.

There is no need to mobilize a large army to launch a decisive battle. Repeated attacks and destruction can bring down many lords.

The city can protect the safety of the people, but it cannot protect the farmland, pastures, bridges, and reservoirs outside the city...

This harassment could almost be said to continue indefinitely. Even after the defense line was completed, the Near East would still be threatened by the orcs.

There are two ways to deal with it: either cripple the Orc Empire until they dare not come to cause trouble; or follow the example of the northern provinces and build fortresses everywhere, making the city defenses like a maze.

The criss-crossing defense lines are natural dividing zones. Blocking several major traffic arteries will create a ready-made encirclement.

Obviously, the two most effective measures are not easy to implement.

If the Orc Empire could be crippled, the Kingdom would not have to build a Near East defense line. Hudson would have led his army to gallop across the grasslands long ago.

The Northern model is even more difficult to learn. It took the kingdom more than 300 years to build those densely packed fortresses.

"Don't worry, the danger is mainly for the people below. The kingdom has been passed down for more than 300 years, and only seven commanders have died in battle. I'm not that unlucky!"

Hudson consoled.

The outside world only saw his glory, but no one cared about the abyss behind it. Only those closest to him would advise him to be careful.

Taking a step back will open up a new world for ordinary people. In just a few years, Hudson had climbed from a nobleman to his current position. He had no way out.

If the battlefield in the Near East collapses, the entire northern continent may fall into the hands of foreign races, and there will be no mountain territory.

The best option left for Hudson was to retreat to the sea with his remaining forces and find an island to rest temporarily.

...

The Kingdom of Alpha was busy with its Near East strategy and had no time to rebel against the Holy See, and still failed to stop the Franks.

On October 10, 99993 of the Holy Calendar, the Frankish Church announced that it would not recognize the legitimacy of the Holy See on the grounds that the Holy See was controlled by heretics. At the same time, it invited branches in various countries to send representatives to Lutetia to discuss countermeasures.

"Establishing a new church" was put on the table for the first time.

When it comes to religious beliefs, once you are labeled a heretic, there is no room for maneuver.

Now that the Holy See is controlled by heretics, we must naturally unite and take drastic measures to purify the "heretics" and restore the Holy Mountain to a clean state!

The battle horn sounded, which meant that there was no room for relaxation for both sides. Even Hudson, far away in the northern continent, felt the chill.

The Franks not only wanted to rebel against the Vatican themselves, but also wanted to drag everyone else into rebelling against the Vatican.

Whether the two sides would fight or not suddenly became the most concerned topic in the entire continent. Before countries could take sides, various undercurrents began to surge.

From the perspective of the human race, Hudson naturally did not want a civil war to break out at this moment. Once the two top forces started fighting, the human race's power to suppress the alien alliance would no longer exist.

Without the pressure from the human alliance, the aliens would not be as quiet as they are now. Even if the war is not restarted immediately, various border frictions are inevitable.

The situation in the Northern Continent is already very bad. If any more trouble comes out, life will become even more unbearable.

There was no point in worrying. Hudson did not have the ability to influence the decision-making of the two major forces. It was not his turn to worry about the issue of standing in line.

For a long time, the Alpha Kingdom has been the vanguard of the anti-Vatican movement. Now, without doing anything, it has been classified as an "anti-Vatican camp."

You can't even switch camps.

Even if the kingdom declared neutrality to the outside world, the Vatican would probably think that they were plotting a conspiracy and wanted to make a big move at a critical moment.

Even if he directly expressed his support for the Holy See, it was estimated that the Vatican's top brass would think of him as "a spy lurking here!"

Compared to the human countries that are still struggling, the Alpha Kingdom, which took sides without having to choose, directly acted as a spectator.

As for interference, the kingdom is not strong enough, and if it jumps out to make decisions, it will only bring humiliation upon itself; in the case of civil war, it will be out of reach of either of the two major camps.

If you can't get involved, just keep working hard.

On the Holy Mountain, Pius VII was facing everyone with a gloomy face. There were rumors that this evil demon pretending to be the Pope fainted on the spot after learning that his identity was exposed.

Obviously, all of this is just a rumor. As a Saint Domain expert, how could he not have the psychological capacity to endure this?

But it was inevitable to be angry. The Dawn Church had existed for so many years, but this was the first time someone had declared them illegal, and the excuse used was still "demon possession."

If you look at the general history of the mainland, you will know that the Vatican's favorite thing is to use the excuse of "demon possession" to put people on the barbecue.

It is ironic that they were charged with the same crime.

"Why aren't you all talking now? Those heretics have already openly raised the banner of rebellion. If we delay any further, I'm afraid we will really become heretics!"

Pius VII scolded angrily.

He knew that the Holy See was unpopular on the mainland, but he never imagined that the situation would deteriorate to this extent.
